contextId.occurrenceNote: This phrase is comparing the pieces of the statue to small and light things which could be blown away by the wind. Alternate translation: "like dry pieces of grass blowing away in the wind" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: like the chaff of the threshing floors in the summer

contextId.occurrenceNote: The fourth kingdom is spoken of as being as strong as iron. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
Something about God's hair looked like pure wool. Possible meanings are that 1) it was very white or 2) it was thick and curly. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: the hair of his head was like pure wool

contextId.occurrenceNote: The person that Daniel saw was not a normal man, but had a human figure like a man. "I also saw that night someone coming who resembled a son of man, that is, he had a human figure" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: I saw one coming ... like a son of man

contextId.occurrenceNote: His body gleamed with blue or yellow light as if it were made of topaz. Alternate translation: "his body gleamed like topaz" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
His face shone brightly as a bolt of lightning shines. Alternate translation: "his face shone with light as bright as the flash of lightning" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])

His eyes were bright with light as if they were flaming torches. Alternate translation: "his eyes were so bright that it seemed they had torches burning inside them" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: His eyes were like flaming torches

contextId.occurrenceNote: His arms and feet were as shiny as if they were made of polished bronze. Alternate translation: "his arms and feet shone like polished bronze that reflects the light around it" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: his arms and his feet were like polished bronze

contextId.occurrenceNote: His voice was so loud that it was as if a crowd of people were all talking loudly. Alternate translation: "his voice was as loud as a huge crowd all calling out together" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: The sound of his words was like the sound of a great crowd

contextId.occurrenceNote: The way the large army covers the land will be like a flood of water. Alternate translation: "will be so great in number that they will cover all the land" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
This refers to God's people who will share their wisdom with those around them. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: Those who are wise will shine like the brightness of the sky above

contextId.occurrenceNote: These people are compared to the stars that shine. Alternate translation: "those who turn ... will shine brightly like the stars forever and ever" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: those who turn ... are like the stars forever and ever
